articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: China's Xi discusses ties, Afghanistan in phone call with Merkel - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Reuters): China's President Xi Jinping urged Germany to promote a "correct" policy towards China within the European Union in a phone call with German Chancellor Angela Merkel, according to a Chinese state media report on Friday (Sept 10).
